subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Same stupid nasty negative BS!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
It's the same old story, ignore all facts, ignore all users, deny deny
deny!

 Ahhh Dah! they address me by name!

 And there ya go, it's all me, I'm the bad guy, how dare I question sacred
science. I'm the one after a cult following-Don't look in a frikin' mirror,
never question your brainwashing! Presumptuous self righteous twit!

 No, this BS will not continue here.

 Frank-S

On Wed, Jun 9, 2010 at 11:33 PM, Lizzie Broden <yahuli69@...> wrote:

>
>
>   "Need I remind anyone how many times "science" has been wrong--over and
> over and over--it's a freaking useless discipline, all it does is build
> egos!"
>
> Anybody see a problem with this line of thinking?  Anybody see the pure
> insanity of that said as a factual statement?  Modern Medicine? LOL  Ummmmmm
> basic Physics?  It would be insane, more than that, asinine to say that
> Science has never helped mankind or is a worthless endeavor.  <<<<<< Wasted
> space even having to write the words out.  It is unquestionable, on the
> whole.
>
> I have seen several bright minds ask for more information.  Studies that
> are quoted from and "EVP Experts"  Yet I am seeing that information slow to
> come forth.
>
> You are very correct.  Science has been wrong many times before.  But, it
> is always self correcting.  Not because of ego, but because of the very
> reason you are mad at it.  It is an unrelenting, cold-hearted swamp bitch!
> LOL   Science is not a thing that cares about what you want or think you
> hear.  It cares about verifiable, commendable and repeatable evidence.
>
> The problem you are having, well other than not getting the Thorizie shots
> on time LOL  Might be, the about lack of logic in the theory to begin with.
>
>
> What you are doing is going from point (A) to point (C)  And never taking a
> real hard look at point (B)  Now, you are an electrician guy.  You of all
> people understand the idea of circuits and connections and flow.  The same
> thing works in Logic and Science.
>
> POINT (A)  I am taking a constantly scaning radio and getting voices.
>
> POINT (C)  They are talking to me and making sense.  They are telling me
> all kinds of information that no one could ever know, at least as I perceive
> it.
>
> Now here is the real kicker!
>
> POINT (B)  Yeah this is the hard one.  How do you know they are taking to
> you?  You do understand the nature of the human mind and how it works?  Do
> you understand that this information is nothing new and it dates back to the
> year 1956? (I am thinking)
>
> How do you get past point (B)?  Do you except it on faith?  That is a
> Religion.  Can we study it as a Science?
>
> And if we come to our own conclusions about things are we not all heretics
> in the school of "Frank"  Maybe the word "Church" would be better LOL
>
> Get me past point (B) and I will lead the charge against the ignorant
> Scientific / Skeptic assholes out to get FRANK.
>
> Till then, there are problems with logic.
>
>
> "Nature is showing us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that
> the lion belongs to it even though, because of its large size, it cannot
> totally reveal itself all at once."
> -— Albert Einstein
>
>
> "It is far better to grasp the universe as it really is than to persist in
> delusions, however satisfying and reassuring."
> --Carl Sagan
>
>
> "There is no such thing as an insignificant detail. Don't just look
> for what you want to find."
> -- Me LOL
>
>
>  ------------------------------

>>  It's probably not kosher to post this, but I find this highly insulting
>> to all of us. As usual, igonore all facts and all other methods, such as
>> EVPmaker, which forms all the voices inside the computer. Ignore all phone
>> EVP messages, ignore all voices heard with no electronic aids. Ignore
>> messages received via turned off TV and printers--and on and on, yet they
>> know all about EVP..Ignore the fact that probably thousands use boxes
>> successfully.
>>
>> "We have conducted a few listening studies of reported radio-sweep EVP and
>> the results have not been good. We have also worked with a variety of such
>> devices. Based on what we know about trans-etheric influences, how EVP and
>> visual forms of ITC are formed and what we know about mediumship, it is
>> difficult to fit radio-sweep into any established hypothesis. Without solid
>> research supporting it as producing EVP, it is impossible for us to
>> recommend it or support its use. If there were double-blind studies
>> conducted by experienced researchers that shows it does produce phenomena,
>> we would gladly promote it as an alternative technique.
>>
>> We are pretty sure that, in transform EVP (ordinary recorder), the voice
>> is formed in the electronics by transforming available audio-frequency noise
>> in an active part of the electronics such as a transistor junction. We think
>> the process is amplification of a weak telekinetic signal via stochastic
>> resonance and we have found that the optimum audio-frequency signal for this
>> is a chaotic one rich in voice-frequencies with many transient perturbation.
>> That is our working hypothesis. "
>>
>>  I can't say who this is from, cuz almost certain I'd get sued. There's no
>> double blind testing their BS either. Clueless!!
>>
>>  F-S
>>
